Blackfang: A stasis pod... here... Wait! This means... we're on 
Earth!!! Hot Rod! Megatron! Why is that maniac here? We'll have to 
hunt him down when we're established... And I think there was quite a 
crew with him...

Blackfang thought about it and just showed his teeth out of anger. The 
Ark was still on this planet. The very survival of the Maximals was at 
stake once again. However, there was the Nemesis too. No, thought 
Blackfang, that is the coward's way out.

Blackfang: Let's find this Maximal and prepare our forces. This will 
be a tough war.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., RoboRick007 <rfa007@c...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "Sorry, I'll wait for you next time. I just wanted to get out and 
look around."
> 
> He continues on.
